home.intro: Making it possible for true fans to own one of the most sought-after collectibles in football. The Goal Ball!

descriptions.1: Be part of the community and start completing your collection.
descriptions.2: Get your favourite teams and players’ footballs.
descriptions.3: Through owning a digital collectible, the physical ball could be yours.
descriptions.4: Enjoy all the perks of your collectible.
descriptions.5: Complete the collections and get rewards.

league.title: LaLiga
league.description: Collect all the Gol-Balls from the season’s top scorers. They'll be the players who score five or more goals-  you can win unique rewards like signed jerseys, dinner with your idols and much more.

team.title: Club Collections
team.description: Collect all the Gol-Balls from your favorite club during the season. When you complete the collection, you'll get an exclusive Gol-Ball that only true Gol-Ball collectors possess.

scorer.title: Goal Scorer's Club Collection
scorer.description: Collect all the Gol-Balls from your favorite player throughout the season. When you complete the collection you'll get a special reward.

errors.GENERIC_ERROR: An error ocurred. Please, try again.

0.question: What is Gol-Ball?
0.answer: It unites the physical and Web3 world. For each ball with which a goal is scored in LaLiga Santander, we create a digital version of it. In order for this to happen, the ball is removed from the field, identified, certified and digitized so it can become a digital collectible.Each Gol-Ball that is acquired brings with it a chance of winning the physical ball with which the goal was scored.

1.question: How do they certify the ball?
1.answer: Each ball has an unique sticker that guarantees its authenticity. In addition, it includes a unique QR code with all the details of the goal.

2.question: Is the physical ball for sale?
2.answer: No. The physical ball is not for sale. The physical ball can be obtained through a random draw between the users who acquire a series of each digital collectible.

3.question: What is a digital collectible?
3.answer: It is a unique item that you can acquire to collect, share, trade or sell on different Web3 platforms. These collectibles use blockchain technology to guarantee their authenticity.

4.question: How do I participate for the physical ball?
4.answer: In order to participate for the physical ball, you must first acquire a digital collectible available on our Website. After acquiring your digital collectible you will be assigned a number and entered into the random draw for the physical ball, which will then be delivered to you if you have the winning number.

5.question: When do you get the ball?
5.answer: Among the users who acquire a Gol-Ball, a random combination will be made to deliver the physical ball of that goal.

6.question: How much do the collectibles cost?
6.answer: Each Gol-Ball has an independent value, its variables are based on the type of goal, the championship, the score, player who scored, and other statistics. Usually you’ll be able to get yours for $5.

0.question: LaLiga Museum
0.answer: A Goal-Ball from El Clásico, from each derby and from Atlético de Madrid vs. Barcelona will be sent to the LaLiga museum and will be available for sale at the end of the season in a special event.

1.question: Double Goal
1.answer: This is when two players score a goal with the same ball. This happens because the ball did not leave the field of play when the first goal was scored. It is an exceptionally rare case.

2.question: Own Goal
2.answer: When a player scores an own goal it will also be available as a digital collectible.

3.question: Goal details
3.answer: The information related to the goal. You’ll be able to find the goal tactic, the minute in which it was scored, the player who scored, the stadium, the day, the season, the chain of custody and much more.

4.question: Digital certificate
4.answer: This comes with the digital collectible that you acquire on our website, it has a unique design and contains a QR code with all the goal details

5.question: 3D Ball
5.answer: This is the official ball of LaLiga Santander in its digital and 3D version. You can see the ball from various angles, find the Gol-Ball sticker with the ball’s information, a QR code and also the signature of the player who scored.

6.question: Digital Collectible
6.answer: This is a unique item that you can acquire to collect, share, exchange, sell on different Web3 platforms. These collectibles use blockchain technology to guarantee their authenticity.

7.question: Chain of custody
7.answer: This is the photographic record that is made on each goalscoring ball, from the moment it hits the back of the net until it is authenticated and certified.

8.question: Gol-Ball
8.answer: This is the official ball of a LaLiga Santander match with which a goal is scored in any of the matches in the competition. / This is the ball with which a goal is scored in any LaLiga Santander match

9.question: Collections
9.answer:
There are three options that we have created for you to collect Gol-Balls from:
Your favorite LaLiga club
The goalscorer of a team
The top goalscorer from a season

0.question: Can I pay with a credit card?
0.answer: Yes, all types of credit cards are accepted.

1.question: Can I pay with a debit card?
1.answer: Yes, all types of debit cards are accepted

0.question: What happens if there is a hat-trick?
0.answer: The 3 different balls with which the player scored will be certified.

1.question: What happens if the ball does not leave the field after a goal, and another goal is scored with it?
1.answer: This is an exceptional case that makes the ball even more special. In our market it will appear as a Double Gol.

2.question: How do I know that I am acquiring the Gol-Ball that I chose and not another?
2.answer: Gol-Ball has a process that allows each game to verify when a player scores a goal, so that the ball is removed from the field and later authenticated and certified. Additionally, a strict chain of custody of the goal ball is maintained with photographic evidence of removal and certification.

3.question: Can I buy the Gol-Ball collectibles for a match before it starts?
3.answer: No. Gol-Ball collectibles are created in real time, so they will be available to acquire after each goal is scored.

4.question: How can you take the ball home?
4.answer: When the winner is chosen, a member of our team will contact you to organise the collection of the ball at our office in Madrid, or delivery to your home.

5.question: What happens if a collectible runs out? Will there be more?
5.answer: No. We make limited units of digital collectibles available to users and when all of them are claimed they will no longer be available.

6.question: What happens in the rare scenario of a Double Goal?
6.answer: In the event that more than one goal is scored with a single physical ball, the random draw will be made available to the owners of the series of Gol-Ball digital collectibles.

cookiesSnackbar.content: Our website only uses strictly necessary cookies to ensure proper functioning. These cookies are set in response to normal web use and actions taken by the user, such as language settings, logging in, and do not store any info that unambiguously identifies the user or any confidential or personal info. If you continue to use our website, you must accept our use of these cookies.
